description: Sets limits for maximum submissions in a SubmissionRound.

totalSubmissionLimit.description: The maximum total number of submissions per team/participant for the entirety of the round.

dailySubmissionLimit.description: The maximum submissions that can be made day. Resets at 00:00:00 UTC

weeklySubmissionLimit.description: The maximum submissions that can be made each week. Resets every Monday at 00:00:00 UTC

monthlySubmissionLimit.description: The maximum submissions that can be made each month. Resets on the 1st day of every calendar month at 00:00:00 UTC
